wikipedia_page.main: Willie Gibson (born 3 April 1953) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a forward.

response: *Willie Gibson (footballer, born 1898) (1898–1992), Scottish footballer who played for Newcastle United
*Willie Gibson (footballer, born 1953), Scottish footballer for Hearts, Partick Thistle, Raith Rovers and Cowdenbeath
*Willie Gibson (footballer, born 1984), Scottish footballer who currently plays for Dumbarton
